document.full_text: american dustin johnson held a two stroke lead over a trio of challengers, including britain's luke donald, after the third round of the wgc-cadillac championship on saturday.
document.title: johnson holds two-shot lead over chasing trio at doral
lines_and_colors: american dustin johnson held a two stroke lead over a trio of challengers, including britain's luke donald, after the third round of the wgc-cadillac championship on saturday.
